description:
Jimmy`s Typhlosion was first seen battling against Shinji`s Hitmonlee in a one-on-one battle. It easily defeated Hitmonlee and the crowd cheered at the end of the battle.
Typhlosion showed it had a good sense of humor and a fun personality as it turned on Jimmy when Marina asked if Jimmy was shy. It smirked giving Marina the answer to her question.
name: Bakphoon (Kenta)
